body:
spack fails to correctly setup the environment under tcsh with the following lines in .cshrc

setenv SPACK_ROOT /Users/mike/software/Spack
source $SPACK_ROOT/share/spack/setup-env.csh

The following error is returned when sourcing the configuration file:
    spack: Command not found.

reverting commit  06418a3dcd5dda0c45151ceec08aa91d8e3fa651 fixes this issue
title: broken environment configuration under tcsh
